alert.note: Alert for Bulloch; Tattnall (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Charleston (the Southern end of South Carolina and Eastern Georgia)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued July 20 at 9:54PM EDT until July 20 at 10:30PM EDT by NWS Charleston
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1030 PM EDT FOR PORTIONS OF SCREVEN...BULLOCH...CANDLER...TATTNALL...HAMPTON... COLLETON AND ALLENDALE COUNTIES... At 954 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 8 miles north of Lodge to 6 miles west of Estill to near Metter, moving southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and powerlines. These severe thunderstorms will remain over mainly rural areas of Screven, Bulloch, Candler, Tattnall, Hampton, Colleton and Allendale Counties, including the following locations... Westchester, Collins Lake, Middleground, Milbury, Cooperville, Hunters Pointe, Farmdale, Huntington, Nixville, and Cameron. This warning includes I-16 between mile markers 96 and 108. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
